name: Old Bay® Tuna Spread
author: Veronica Standeven
summary: The flavor of Old Bay® seasoning goes well with the tuna and cream cheese combination for an easy-to-make spread. Serve with crackers, chips, or veggie dippers.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package low-fat cream cheese, softened
2 tablespoons minced sweet onion (such as Vidalia®)
2 tablespoons capers - rinsed, drained, and chopped
3 drops hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or more to taste
directions: Whip cream cheese in a bowl with an electric hand mixer
Add onion, capers, lemon zest and juice, seafood seasoning, parsley, Worcestershire, and hot sauce
Add tuna and mix until well blended
Refrigerate for 2 hours, or up to overnight
